Attribute.Description: This multivalued field is used to record the values of the license or registration plate associated with an individual.

Attribute.Name: displayName
Attribute.Description: preferred name of a person to be used when displaying entries

Attribute.Name: employeeNumber
Attribute.Description: numerically identifies an employee within an organization'

Attribute.Name: employeeType
Attribute.Description: Used to identify the employer to employee relationship. Typical values used will be "Contractor", "Employee", "Intern", "Temp", "External", and "Unknown" but any value may be used.

Attribute.Name: givenName
Attribute.Description: The givenName attribute is used to hold the part of a person's name which is not their surname nor middle name.

Attribute.Name: gender

Attribute.Name: dateOfBirth

Attribute.Name: homePostalAddress
Attribute.Description: The Home postal address attribute type specifies a home postal address for an object. This should be limited to up to 6 lines of 30 characters each.

Attribute.Name: initials
Attribute.Description: The initials attribute contains the initials of some or all of an individuals names, but not the surname(s).

Attribute.Name: jpegPhoto

Attribute.Name: mail
Attribute.Description: RFC1274: RFC822 Mailbox

Attribute.Name: manager
Attribute.Description: The Manager attribute type specifies the manager of an object represented by an entry.

Attribute.Name: mobile
Attribute.Description: The Mobile Telephone Number attribute type specifies a mobile telephone number associated with a person. Attribute values should follow the agreed format for international telephone numbers: i.e., "+44 71 123 4567".

Attribute.Name: o
Attribute.Description: This attribute contains the name of an organization (organizationName).

Attribute.Name: pager
Attribute.Description: The Pager Telephone Number attribute type specifies a pager telephone number for an object. Attribute values should follow the agreed format for international telephone numbers: i.e., "+44 71 123 4567".

Attribute.Name: photo
Attribute.Description: The Photo attribute type specifies a "photograph" for an object. This should be encoded in G3 fax as explained in recommendation T.4, with an ASN.1 wrapper to make it compatible with an X.400 BodyPart as defined in X.420.

Attribute.Name: roomNumber
Attribute.Description: The Room Number attribute type specifies the room number of an object. Note that the commonName attribute should be used for naming room objects.

Attribute.Name: secretary
Attribute.Description: The Secretary attribute type specifies the secretary of a person. The attribute value for Secretary is a distinguished name

Attribute.Name: userCertificate
Attribute.Description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'userCertificate;binary'.

Attribute.Name: x500uniqueIdentifier
Attribute.Description: The x500UniqueIdentifier attribute is used to distinguish between objects when a distinguished name has been reused. This is a different attribute type from both the "uid" and "uniqueIdentifier" types.

Attribute.Name: preferredLanguage
Attribute.Description: Preferred written or spoken language for a person

Attribute.Name: userSMIMECertificate
Attribute.Description: A PKCS#7 [RFC2315] SignedData, where the content that is signed is ignored by consumers of userSMIMECertificate values. It is recommended that values have a `contentType' of data with an absent `content' field. Values of this attribute contain a person's entire certificate chain and an smimeCapabilities field [RFC2633] that at a minimum describes their SMIME algorithm capabilities. Values for this attribute are to be stored and requested in binary form, as 'userSMIMECertificate;binary'. If available, this attribute is preferred over the userCertificate attribute for S/MIME applications.

Attribute.Name: userPKCS12
Attribute.Description: PKCS #12 [PKCS12] provides a format for exchange of personal identity information. When such information is stored in a directory service, the userPKCS12 attribute should be used. This attribute is to be stored and requested in binary form, as 'userPKCS12;binary'. The attribute values are PFX PDUs stored as binary data.

Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Description: This attribute contains the title, such as "Vice President", of a person in their organizational context. The "personalTitle" attribute would be used for a person's title independent of their job function.

Attribute.Name: academicTitle
Attribute.Description: This attribute contains the title, such as "Phd", of a person in their organizational context. The "academicTitle" attribute would be used for a person's title independent of their job function.
